title: used by Three UK in their phone bill statement. IDENTIFONT says Almaq Refined, but the "y" and other letters don't really match...
author: Feromone

comments.content: [Modena Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072303/http:/www.newlyn.com/work/client/3), bespoke typeface by Miles newlyn exclusively for Three UK. Commercial version of Modena [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072303/http:/www.newlyn.com/fonts/fonts/modena).

wow... you are good!  
Thanks a lot!
